00053         class Frame : public Group {
00054          public:
00055             Frame(const Point& inOrigin, const Size& inSize, const Style& inStyle=Style());
00056             
00057             Point getOrigin(void) const;
00058             Size  getSize() const;
00059

00066

00068             Frame(const string& inName, const XML::AttributeList& inAttributes=XML::AttributeList());
00069             
00070          private:
00071             // transforms are not allowed in frames

00074
